mapper.select: SELECT B.CHILDREN_NAME, CHILDREN_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ, CLASS_NAME, SCHOOL_SEQ, CLASS_SEQ FROM(SELECT A.CHILDREN_NAME, CHILDREN_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ, CLASS_NAME, SCHOOL_SEQ, CLASS_SEQ,ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM( SELECT CHILDREN_NAME, CHILDREN_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ, CLASS_NAME, SCHOOL_SEQ, CLASS_SEQ FROM CHILDREN JOIN SCHOOL USING(CHILDREN_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ) JOIN CLASS USING(CHILDREN_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ,SCHOOL_SEQ) ORDER BY CLASS_NAME,CHILDREN_SEQ DESC)A)B WHERE SCHOOL_SEQ = #{school_seq} AND RNUM BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALPAGE FROM(SELECT CHILDREN_NAME, CHILDREN_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ, CLASS_NAME, SCHOOL_SEQ, CLASS_SEQ FROM CHILDREN JOIN SCHOOL USING(CHILDREN_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ) JOIN CLASS USING(CHILDREN_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ, SCHOOL_SEQ) )WHERE SCHOOL_SEQ = #{school_seq}
